wikipedia_page.main: Lynne Hanley (born 1943) is an American feminist author and literary critic. She is Professor Emerita of literature and writing at Hampshire College.

response: *Writing War: Fiction, Gender & Memory, Lynne Hanley (1991)
Writing War: Fiction, Gender, & Memory is a 1991 text on  women authors, war stories, and literary criticism by American professor Lynne Hanley.
